availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William S. Opdyke (New York City, New York, attorney and notary public)

body.p: New York City, New York, attorney and notary public. New York native. Son of George Opdyke and Elizabeth Opdyke. Married to Margaret Opdyke. Attorney in New York City in 1860. Notary public in New York City in 1865.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, New York, New York, Ward 18, District 2, p. 154-55.; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, New Jersey, Bergen County, Hackensack, p. 140; Find A Grave, "William Stryker Opdyke (1836-1922)," Memorial #101727022, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=OP&GSpartial=1&GSbyrel=all&GSst=33&GScntry=4&GSsr=441&GRid=101727022& (accessed May 24, 2017).
